description.value: You wrap the target in purifying flames. You can attempt to counteract a single poison or non-curse effect imparting the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dazzled], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fatigued], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Paralyzed], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied] condition. The target can choose to empower the flames with their life force, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 1} (or increasing their drained value by 1, if already under the condition) to grant you a +1 circumstance bonus to your counteract check.
